name: KineretSeaLevel
0:
”Alexa, open Kineret sea level”
”Alexa, ask kineret sea level what is the current status”
”Alexa, ask kineret sea level, how far are we from the red lines”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kineret sea level
des: The Kineret, as known as the Sea-of-Galilee is the lowest freshwater lake on Earth and the second-lowest lake in the world (after the Dead Sea, a saltwater lake) at levels between 215 meters (705 ft) and 209 meters (686 ft) below sea level. It is one of the main sources of drinking water in Israel. The sea level must stay between two red lines, a lower and upper red lines. The sea level is measured every weekday. This skill provides information about the current sea level, the change from the day before and the distance to the two red lines.
